类 AlertService

java.lang.Object
com.financeapp.model.AlertService
public class AlertService extends Object
Alert Service Handles alert generation, persistence, and notification

  • 方法详细资料

    • createAlert

      public AlertService.Alert createAlert(LocalDate date, String message, AlertService.AlertLevel level, String category)
      Create a new alert
      参数:
      date - the date of the alert
      message - Alert message
      level - Alert level
      category - Category (e.g., "Expenses", "System", etc.)
      返回:
      The created alert

    • createAlert

      public AlertService.Alert createAlert(String message, AlertService.AlertLevel level, String category)
      Create a new alert with current date
      参数:
      message - Alert message
      level - Alert level
      category - Category (e.g., "Expenses", "System", etc.)
      返回:
      The created alert

    • acknowledgeAlert

      public boolean acknowledgeAlert(String alertId)
      Acknowledge an alert
      参数:
      alertId - ID of the alert to acknowledge
      返回:
      true if acknowledged, false if not found
